div.h2: Detroit Achievement Academy is a free public charter school currently serving kindergarten through seventh grade students.
div.p: We at Detroit Achievement Academy want to shake things up a bit. We have a grand vision for what education can look like and are excited to be creating it in the great city of Detroit. We are using the best educational model in the country, Expeditionary Learning, and are committed to our students, their families, and to our neighborhood. We believe that all students can achieve at high levels and that it is our responsibility to support them in an intense and holistic way. We are thrilled to be able to provide a world-class education in a world-class city.
Take your time poking around our website and learning more about our work. If you have any questions that we don't answer here, feel free to drop us a line at hello@detroitachievement.org.

img.alt: Next Wednesday, join us HERE on @instagram live with our sister school @detroitprep2016 to hear more about our school communities, our unique learning model, and all about our current hiring opportunities. Please share this post with anyone who may be interested in joining our team in the 2020-21 school year by tagging them below! Bonus points (read: entered to win some exciting raffle prizes) if you share in your story and tag us 🎉

Next Wednesday, join us HERE on @instagram live with our sister school @detroitprep2016 to hear more about our school communities, our unique learning model, and all about our current hiring opportunities. Please share this post with anyone who may be interested in joining our team in the 2020-21 school year by tagging them below! Bonus points (read: entered to win some exciting raffle prizes) if you share in your story and tag us 🎉

We’ve always been blown away by the creativity of our art teacher @artwithmiss.brott, but we are SO impressed with the way that she is teaching art virtually. She’s hosting fun challenges, still collaborating with teachers as our students continue learning about their @eleducation module topics, and her online classroom is just 😍 We posted the link in our bio if you’d like to take a look around and get inspired! 🎨

We’ve always been blown away by the creativity of our art teacher @artwithmiss.brott, but we are SO impressed with the way that she is teaching art virtually. She’s hosting fun challenges, still collaborating with teachers as our students continue learning about their @eleducation module topics, and her online classroom is just 😍 We posted the link in our bio if you’d like to take a look around and get inspired! 🎨

One week from today, @gleanersfoodbank will be at our school handing out two weeks worth of groceries for any family who needs it. We are so grateful for organizations who are so dedicated to supporting our city during this time ♥️ Please help us get the word out and pass this along!

One week from today, @gleanersfoodbank will be at our school handing out two weeks worth of groceries for any family who needs it. We are so grateful for organizations who are so dedicated to supporting our city during this time ♥️ Please help us get the word out and pass this along!

“It brings me great pride and joy to be on a team where we have some of the best educators, artists, social workers, musicians and support staff in the city of Detroit who all work towards the same goal - providing a safe, equitable, high quality education for ALL students regardless of race, background, or socioeconomic status.” - Ms. V, when asked why she loves being a part of the DAA family ♥️ Come join us! Link to our most updated hiring information at the link in our bio ✨

“It brings me great pride and joy to be on a team where we have some of the best educators, artists, social workers, musicians and support staff in the city of Detroit who all work towards the same goal - providing a safe, equitable, high quality education for ALL students regardless of race, background, or socioeconomic status.” - Ms. V, when asked why she loves being a part of the DAA family ♥️ Come join us! Link to our most updated hiring information at the link in our bio ✨

“I love DAA because I can be myself as a person and educator. Being at DAA has given me opportunities to grow inside and outside the classroom. I feel valued as a professional as well as a person because of what I've been able to achieve with my class and in my professional life.” - Ms. V, when asked why she loves being a part of our DAA crew ♥️ Come work with us! Link in our bio ✨

“I love DAA because I can be myself as a person and educator. Being at DAA has given me opportunities to grow inside and outside the classroom. I feel valued as a professional as well as a person because of what I've been able to achieve with my class and in my professional life.” - Ms. V, when asked why she loves being a part of our DAA crew ♥️ Come work with us! Link in our bio ✨

Meet Ms. V, our 2nd grade crew leader! Here’s a few things you should know about her: • She received her Education degree from @waynestate and has been teaching for six years in 1st and 2nd grade classrooms 🎓🍎 • Her favorite thing to teach is reading, but definitely acknowledges it is one of the trickiest parts of the 2nd grade curriculum! 📚♥️ • She’s DAA’s Garden Coordinator, and is so passionate about urban farming and gardening and sharing her knowledge with anyone who wants to learn 🌱☀️ • She’s getting married in August and has three rescue dogs at home 👰🏻💕🐕 We love you, Ms. V!!

Meet Ms. V, our 2nd grade crew leader! Here’s a few things you should know about her: • She received her Education degree from @waynestate and has been teaching for six years in 1st and 2nd grade classrooms 🎓🍎 • Her favorite thing to teach is reading, but definitely acknowledges it is one of the trickiest parts of the 2nd grade curriculum! 📚♥️ • She’s DAA’s Garden Coordinator, and is so passionate about urban farming and gardening and sharing her knowledge with anyone who wants to learn 🌱☀️ • She’s getting married in August and has three rescue dogs at home 👰🏻💕🐕 We love you, Ms. V!!

Detroit Achievement Academy is growing, and we’re looking for a kindergarten and 4th grade teacher to join our team next year! Want to join our team of dedicated, kind, creative, and joyful educators? Head to the link in our bio for more details ✨

Detroit Achievement Academy is growing, and we’re looking for a kindergarten and 4th grade teacher to join our team next year! Want to join our team of dedicated, kind, creative, and joyful educators? Head to the link in our bio for more details ✨

Mark your calendars! Next Tuesday April 7th from 9a - 12p, @gleanersfoodbank will be at DAA for another food pantry mobile pick-up! Each free kit comes with 10 shelf-stable breakfasts and lunches, and other miscellaneous grocery items. Please help us spread the word by sharing this post, and ensure every Detroiter is fed! ♥️

Mark your calendars! Next Tuesday April 7th from 9a - 12p, @gleanersfoodbank will be at DAA for another food pantry mobile pick-up! Each free kit comes with 10 shelf-stable breakfasts and lunches, and other miscellaneous grocery items. Please help us spread the word by sharing this post, and ensure every Detroiter is fed! ♥️

Before we headed into this time of virtual learning, Ms. Stewart shared some ways that her first grade crew encouraged and celebrated women empowerment. She posted about it over on our blog (the link is in our bio) if you’d like to read 💪🏽♥️
